member.summary: The size of this Berry, in millimeters.

member.summary: The smoothness of this Berry, used in making Pokéblocks or Poffins.

member.name: P:PokeAPI.Berry.SoilDryness
member.summary: The speed at which this Berry dries out the soil as it grows. A higher rate means the soil dries more quickly.

member.summary: The firmness of this berry, used in making Pokéblocks or Poffins.
